Package controllers

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MainMenu
  • public class MainMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the main menu view.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton aiBtn
      ToggleButton for selecting to vs the AI.
      private models.GameMode gameMode
      Stores user selection of game mode.
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView gearIV
      ImageView displaying a gear for the options menu button.
      private javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton humanBtn
      ToggleButton for selecting to vs a second human opponent.
      private java.lang.String IMAGES_DIRECTORY
      Absolute location of the image assets directory.
      private LaunchGameCallback launchGameCB
      Interface invoked to tell the scene controller to launch a game.
      private LaunchOptionsMenuCallback optionsMenuCB
      Interface invoked to tell the scene controller to open the options menu.

      Player object describing the first player.

      Pane for displaying player one's marker.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField playerOneNameTF
      TextField for displaying and editing the first player's name.
      private java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscription playerOneSubscription
      Subscription to player one updates.

      Player object describing the second player.
      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane playerTwoMarkerPane
      Pane for displaying player two's marker.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField playerTwoNameTF
      TextField for displaying and editing the second player's name.

      Subscription to player two updates.

      Root pane of the view.

      Some game modes have a configurable quantity associated with them.
      private LaunchShapePickerCallback shapePickerCB
      Interface invoked to tell the scene controller to open the marker menu.
      private boolean singlePlayer
      Stores whether or not the player has selected a single player game.

        Player object describing the second player.

      • playerTwoSubscription

        private java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscription playerTwoSubscription
        Subscription to player two updates.

      • secondaryOption

        private int secondaryOption
        Some game modes have a configurable quantity associated with them. For instance, GameMode.BULLET allows players to set the timer duration. This field stores the input value for such game mode properties.

      • shapePickerCB

        private LaunchShapePickerCallback shapePickerCB
        Interface invoked to tell the scene controller to open the marker menu.

      • singlePlayer

        private boolean singlePlayer
        Stores whether or not the player has selected a single player game.

      • IMAGES_DIRECTORY

        private final java.lang.String IMAGES_DIRECTORY
        Absolute location of the image assets directory.
        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenu

        public MainMenu()
        Constructs a default instance of MainMenu. - Player one will be named "Player 1" and have a black MarkerShape.X marker. - Player two will be named "Player 2" and have a black MarkerShape.O marker. - Single player will be set to true. - Game mode will be set to GameMode.FREE_PLAY.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Sets the default state of the view's interactive elements.

      • getRoot

        public javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane getRoot()
        Gets the root element of the MainMenu view.

      • setLaunchGameCB

        public void setLaunchGameCB​(LaunchGameCallback launchGameCB)
        Sets the callback to be invoked when the MainMenu wishes to launch a new game.

      • setOptionsMenuCB

        public void setOptionsMenuCB​(LaunchOptionsMenuCallback optionsMenuCB)
        Sets the callback to be invoked when the MainMenu wants to open the options menu.

      • setPlayers

        public void setPlayers​(models.Player playerOne,
                       models.Player playerTwo)
        Sets and binds the two players in the game.

      • setShapePickerCB

        public void setShapePickerCB​(LaunchShapePickerCallback shapePickerCB)
        Sets the callback to be invoked when the MainMenu wants to launch a marker picker menu.

      • onAiAction

        private void onAiAction()
        Set singlePlayer to true when the user clicks the AI button.

      • onHumanAction

        private void onHumanAction()
        Set singlePlayer to false when the user clicks humanBtn.

      • onOptions

        void onOptions​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Invoke the optionsMenuCB when the user hits the options menu button.

      • onPlayAction

        void onPlayAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Invoke the launchGameCB when the user hits the play button, feeding it the user's chosen game state. The controller assumes it will be unloaded and releases certain state objects from memory, so likely will not funciton fully if it persists after invoking this method.

      • onPlayerOneKeyTyped

        void onPlayerOneKeyTyped​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Update player one's name when the user types in $playerOneNameTF.

      • onPlayerOneShapeAction

        void onPlayerOneShapeAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Invoke the shapePickerCB when the user clicks

      • onPlayerTwoKeyTyped

        void onPlayerTwoKeyTyped​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Binds KeyEvents from the TextField to playerTwo's name.

      • onPlayerTwoShapeAction

        void onPlayerTwoShapeAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Invoke the shapePickerCB when the user clicks

      • animateSinglePlayerButtons

        private void animateSinglePlayerButtons()
        Transitions the background colors of the vsHuman/vsAI buttons whenever they are toggled.

      • setMarker

        private void setMarker​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane,
                       models.Player player)
        Updates the background image of the provided pane to display the player's marker.
        Parameters:
        pane - The pane element whose background should display the marker.
        player - The player whose marker should be displayed.

        private void subscribeToPlayerTwo()
